Custom Tank Sight – Minimal UI with Extra Features
This is a clean, minimalistic user sight for War Thunder ground vehicles, designed to reduce clutter while adding useful elements like:
• Reload counter
• Ammo type indicator
How to install:

  1. Download the file
  2. Move it to the tank_sight_presets folder inside your War Thunder game directory
  3. Restart the game if it doesn’t show up immediately
  4. Go to Options → Ground vehicle Battle Settings → Sight settings and apply it to your preferred vehicles

#sight #certifiedmonke

Stefan Uroš IV Dušan, also known as Dušan the Mighty, was the King of Serbia from 8 September 1331 and Emperor of the Serbs, Greeks, Bulgarians and Albanians from 16 April 1346 until his death in 1355.
